bug.author: Tareqox
bug.summary: Set gatherUsageStats via streamlit run paramter
bug.description:
<denchmark-h:h1>Summary</denchmark-h>
Analogous to streamlit run app.py --server.enableCORS False i tried to set: streamlit run app.py --server.gatherUsageStats False it gives me the error, that the parameter is not known. Can you set this parameter at all via streamlit run? If so, what is the correct name? I did not find a documentary about it either (or any documentary regarding the parameter to set via streamlit run

comments.comment: Hi <denchmark-link:https://github.com/Tareqox>@Tareqox</denchmark-link> , It's --browser.gatherUsageStats. Running streamlit config show will provide you with all the options.
